document.full_text: wayne rooney scored in the 24th minute to give manchester united a victory and barcelona routed visiting shakhtar donetsk to close in on a semifinal matchup with real madrid.
document.title: manchester united 1, chelsea 0; barcelona 5, shakhtar donetsk: man united, barcelona win in champions league
lines_and_colors: wayne rooney scored in the 24th minute to give manchester united a victory and barcelona routed visiting shakhtar donetsk to close in on a semifinal matchup with real madrid.
